message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $130.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $120 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth a lot to me.  Would you consider meeting me halfway at $125?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose $120 as the final price for the product.
